## Example Plot 
### Spring 2017 data
* total reads minimum = 2000
* relative reads minimum = 0.05
* OTU 150 (millet) removed (probably need to remove others, too)
* outlier also removed (SO13067)

```{r data_prep, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
# DATA PREP #

test_list_2017 <- filter_reads_data(samples, reads, totals, reads_min = 2000,
                                    yr = 2017, rel_reads_min = 0.05)
test_list2 <- data_prep_multivariate(test_list_2017)

# remove OTU150 (millet)
test_list2[[1]] <- test_list2[[1]] %>% select(-OTU150)

# remove outlier (S013067)
test_list2[[1]] <- test_list2$reads_spread[-105,]
test_list2[[2]] <- test_list2$sampleID[-105]
test_list2[[3]] <- test_list2$groups[-105,]

# make binary
test_list2_binary <- binarize(test_list2[[1]])
```

```{r test, include = TRUE}
NMDS_plotting_prep(test_list2, dist_trnL) %>% 
plot_NMDS_ggplot2()
```
